channel.title: Cinema 4d or metaseqouia?
channel.description: i have a lot of experience with meta but just wondering could i cinema 4d to make and add models to my rsps? because i feel like i could make cooler looking mats in cinema just wondering.

item.title: Cinema 4d or metaseqouia?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:11, topic:515311”][quote author=hadlich4 link=topic=633564.msg4281187#msg4281187 date=1365619812]

just wondering what would you use the source for? i think this is a stupid question but im going to ask anyways.

For learning purposes mainly, you could add features and recompile it, all sorts

hm thats neat have you changed your source?

What source?

like have you edited your datmaker src
[/quote]
Hah, oh, it’s not my source to edit, I didn’t program any of it.
A forum member named MrPotatoHead was the programmer.[/quote]

oh yea ive heard of him. i really need to find a coder me and this other server just joined projects if you wanna check it out

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

its still in process but im wanting to totally hit that uniqueness theme.

Read full topic

item.title: Cinema 4d or metaseqouia?
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:5, topic:515311”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=633564.msg4280262#msg4280262 date=1365439364]

I don’t see why you couldn’t. Just keep in mind you will have to open it in Metasequoia and save it as a .mqo file once you’re done before you can add it anywhere (unless a newer, flexible version of datmaker has been released).
[/quote]I doubt datmaker will ever be updated again. It’s written in Delphi and I don’t think anyone has the open source of the current version.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Source is attached to topic. But yes, very unlikely MrP will ever update it, considering he was accidentally ‘removed’ from the forum completely.[/quote]

just wondering what would you use the source for? i think this is a stupid question but im going to ask anyways.

Read full topic
